channel.title: How do i make my own server?
channel.description: I have no clue on how to make a server like my own moparscape world and i have been trying to for like a month now my friends are waiting for it and now they're like cussing me out about it i really really really really need help guys!!!!!! :,,(,,,

item.title: How do i make my own server?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Lofty Mod Lofty
item.description:
@Mod_Lofty wrote:

How to Make a server

  1. First we will need a Source Download Section

  2. Once you got the source you want download it, Make sure it is scanned

  3. Now before we start editing we need the new Java. follow this tut Jdk 6U1 Tut

  4. Now once you done that open up you source and find client.java (Notepad icon saying client)

  5. Press CTRL and H then find the servers name then change it to yours. (You must make some changes or you will be leeching the server)

  6. Now Save as close, and click compile

  7. Run your server and your done.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my own server?

item.title: How do i make my own server?
item.dc:creator: @gurt gurt
item.description:
@gurt wrote:

free… and Go to downloads and download a source from there and you must have Winrar just go to google and type winrar download and download it than extract the source to a folder or desktop than use Mod T’s Compiler…than runserver bam. and no-ip.com for no-ip ex)mopscape.no-ip.org etc…u must register an account before though

Gurt happy? =s

item.title: How do i make my own server?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Gamma Project Gamma
item.description:
@Project_Gamma wrote:

Go to Server Download and Pick a Good Source that YOU like then download Right Click Extract File To Desktop Then Run Server Then Go to Ipchicken.com or Hammachi.cc make a network or post your ip on Server Advertisements
